name: SoftWerk
short_description:
SoftWerk is a MIDI sequencer. Instead of following the model of "piano-roll" sequencers like Cakewalk (et al.), it is modelled on hardware "analog" /pattern 
sequencers like the Doepfer SchaltWerk. This is a new Gtk-- implementation using libmidi++.
